sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.YEAR, A.ITEM_GRP_ID, A.ITEM_GRP_NM, A.CONTENT, SUM(B.WEIGHT) OVER(PARTITION BY A.YEAR, A.ITEM_GRP_ID) ITEM_WEIGHT, COUNT(B.ITEM_ID) OVER(PARTITION BY A.YEAR, A.ITEM_GRP_ID) ITEM_CNT, A.SORT_ORDER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BSC_MAT_EVAL_USER C WHERE A.YEAR=C.YEAR AND C.EVAL_SUBMIT_YN='Y') SUBMIT_CNT FROM BSC_MAT_ITEM_GRP A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_MAT_ITEM B ON A.YEAR=B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_GRP_ID=B.ITEM_GRP_ID WHERE A.YEAR=#findYear# ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.YEAR , A.ITEM_GRP_ID , A.ITEM_GRP_NM , A.CONTENT , A.SORT_ORDER ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BSC_MAT_EVAL B WHERE A.YEAR = B.YEAR) EVAL_CNT FROM BSC_MAT_ITEM_GRP A WHERE A.YEAR = #year# AND A.ITEM_GRP_ID =#itemGrpId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT 'MGB'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(ITEM_GRP_ID,4,6)),0)+1,4,'0') SEQ FROM BSC_MAT_ITEM_GRP
INSERT INTO BSC_MAT_ITEM_GRP ( YEAR , ITEM_GRP_ID , ITEM_GRP_NM , CONTENT , SORT_ORDER , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #SEQ# , #itemGrpNm# , #content# , #sortOrder# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BSC_MAT_ITEM_GRP SET ITEM_GRP_NM = #itemGrpNm# , CONTENT = #content# , SORT_ORDER = #sortOrder# , MODIFY_DT = SYSDATE WHERE YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId#
DELETE FROM BSC_MAT_ITEM_GRP WHERE YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_GRP_ID = #itemGrpId#
